[#soil-pan-continuity_result-value]
====== Result value

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:soil-soil-pit-characterization-protocol-shapes:soil-pan-continuity:result-value`
|Label | Result value
|Definition | The value of `rdf:value` _MUST_ exist in the Soils pan continuities codes controlled vocabulary.
|Comment | The value in `sosa:hasResult` _MUST_ be a value in `sh:in`, which is the Soils pan continuities codes controlled vocabulary.
include::../../../../statuses/submitted.adoc[]
|Conformance Classes | `TBA`

|Property | Value
|Controlled list items | The result value MUST be from the following list:

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/2d13cf28-c514-5237-8de5-a9563b40fef5[`Continuous`]
